name: Accountium
title: Software Engineer Intern
work: ▹ Actively contributing as a full-stack developer to a dynamic accounting web application, currently serving over 50 small businesses with critical features.

name: University of Alberta

name: Deloitte
title: Software Developer

▹ Utilized Kubernetes to deploy and manage the containerized applications, ensuring scalability and efficient resource utilization.
▹ Led the successful migration of more than 4.5 million user records to a new database by developing Python migration scripts, ensuring data integrity.

name: Chaincode Consulting
